attributes.action: realise the curfew placed on Jack Tweed for the duration of 48 hours for his wedding to Jade Goody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that in the interest of love and humanity and the "feel good factor" in today's climate that the above should be granted

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office - a decision has been made on this case.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
